name: Robo-Catch
description:
Robo-Catch! is a game about catching stuff falling from the sky, make sure you avoid water droplets!

Controls:
Arrow Keys or A & D - Move
Esc - Pause

If you feel something's missing from the game, make sure to make a suggestion in the comments!

NOTE: AUDIO SEEMS TO BE DELAYED ON FIREFOX, PLEASE PLAY THIS GAME USING CHROME/EGDE OR JUST DOWNLOAD IT.
